modules.description: Provides functions to enable seamless interaction between ppx_deriving and ppx_type_conv within the ocaml-migrate-parsetree framework. Operates on abstract syntax tree nodes and derivation annotations. Facilitates custom type conversions and derived code generation in meta-programming workflows.

Registers and manages custom code generation routines for OCaml, enabling transformation of type definitions during preprocessing. Works with type representations and custom derivation logic to produce expanded code. Used to implement domain-specific code generation like JSON serialization or protocol buffer mappings.
